thread.title: Yohan Cabaye in line for Marseille switch this summer but Crystal Palace want £16million
thread.title_full: Yohan Cabaye in line for Marseille switch this summer but Crystal Palace want £16million

author: Darren Lewis
title: Yohan Cabaye in line for Marseille switch this summer but Crystal Palace want £16million
text:
Sport Yohan Cabaye in line for Marseille switch this summer but Crystal Palace want £16million The Eagles slapped a staggering £16million price tag on the Crystal Palace midfielder after an enquiry from the French club in January Share Yohan Cabaye could be off this summer (Photo: Christopher Lee)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Yohan Cabaye is set to find himself the target of a fresh move from Marseille this summer. 
The Eagles slapped a staggering £16million price tag on the Crystal Palace midfielder after an enquiry from the French club in January. 
Yet Marseille, taken over last summer by billionaire businessman Frank McCourt, were not put off. 
Instead they are waiting until the summer when Cabaye will have just a year left on his contract. 
The 31-year-old is open to a move back to his homeland and said: “We are still in the mindset of fighting relegation. That is my priority. 
“For the rest, we will see. I know Rudi Garcia well, Marseille have a good project. In life, everything is possible. I do not know what the future holds for me. I am open to all.” Like us on Facebook
